unnormalised:
Lannaia The Grand Ballroom, 10 Park Street, Kolkata, 700016 aw jabai.

Gami 15/07/2024 ni sim fainai-nongana khontha har, jonha gajaon mitinai thikana aw dongnai jablong ni sangchali logojom bithingthibithing khanithi khalamnwi haigou.
normalised:
Langkhraiya Da Gren Belrumao, doi Park Strit, Kolkata, snwi lakh solouao dong.
Gohana R-S-V-P hor dwigwi hazaar dwigwi gwoswi ni Julai ni gwosi phwila gisim, jabo jwng gajwnao fonaimwn theganaani bibosthaphak bijing bibosthakwu gwjwnthay khanw haywi.
text:
Lannaia The Grand Ballroom, 10 Park Street, Kolkata, 700016 aw jabai.

Gami 15/07/2024 ni sim fainai-nongana khontha har, jonha gajaon mitinai thikana aw dongnai jablong ni sangchali logojom bithingthibithing khanithi khalamnwi haigou.
